industry.name: United States Space Force
industry.title: Full Stack Developer
industry.description: Developed defensive cyber operations for space (DCO-S) software for the United States Space Force (USSF).
tasks: Used Docker, containerization technology, for enterprise microservice applications
Created dynamic user interfaces using the React and Angular JavaScript libraries
Adopted GitLab and used their continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment (CD) services for linting, testing, build automation, and rapid deployment of applications
Developed entity relationship diagrams (ERDs) using diagramming software such as Lucidchart and draw.io
Utilized containerized PostgreSQL databases in enterprise level applications
Created unit tests using testing frameworks such as Jest for JavaScript, and pytest for Python
Wrote representational state transfer (REST) application programming interfaces (APIs) using Flask, a micro framework written in Python

industry.name: United States Air Force
industry.title: Systems Engineer
industry.description: Practiced Agile and DevSecOps to ensure the on-time delivery of the Ground Based Strategic Deterrent (GBSD) missile.
tasks: Briefed the 517th Software Engineering Squadron (SWES) flight on communication skills to provide advice from The Tongue and Quill on oral and written communication
Improved the GBSD Software Oversight/Insight (O/I) Plan by providing extensive knowledge in contractual requirements, policies, and standards
Analyzed contractor/sub-contractor statement of works (SOWs) to gain knowledge of program requirements.
Lead the Razorbacks team as a Scrum Master to enhance integration efficiency by providing guidance, researching processes, adapting to new requirements, and removing impediments
Reformed onboarding process for the 517 SWES
Collaborated with leadership to develop integration activities and training for the new hires
Organized and executed Scrum events as a Scrum Master for the Razorbacks team
Briefed the squadron director at the Program Management Review (PMR) on program integration metrics.
Briefed the group director at the PMR on program integration metrics.
Contributed expertise to the Systems Engineering & Integration (SE&I) team
Provided O/I and systems engineering for General Dynamics Information Technology (GDIT) in support of the acquisition of the Digital Engineering Environment (DEE)
Completed contractor data requirements list (CDRL) reviews to ensure contract compliance
Compiled and briefed newfound knowledge of contractor activities to the SE&I team to provide insight and transfer knowledge
Coordinated with mission partners and stakeholders to transfer knowledge, reduce risk, discuss technical debt, and review roadmaps
